name: Kenny the Houndmaster
description:
You're a blind man who has just found a guide dog. While collecting a lot of nice items and beating bosses along the way, you realised it was the wrong dog. You now had to go back, dropping your items along the way, becoming weaker. Can you rewind the story back and beat the dungeon crawler in reverse-style?

Controls:
* W, A, S, D to Move
* Spacebar to jump
* Left mouse click to attack
